E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/1/1992
Subject: Progress of Dave Burba
Dear Sir,
Dave Burba is doing pretty good at AA Reading Phillies!
He has an ERA of 3.77, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
